history.proof: intros h. hfcrush use: @at_most_n_stream_spec unfold: is_n_stream, is_fin_stream, is_at_most_n_stream.

exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros h. split. - intros [n Hn]. exists n. split. + apply Hn. + intros n' Hlt. destruct (Nat.lt_succ_r n' n) as [Hle|Hgt]. * now apply Nat.lt_succ_r. * intros F. now apply (n_stream_inf_stream_conflict h n' (conj F H)). - intros [n [Hn H]]. exists n. apply Hn.
